onCreateCommand.1-install-system-deps: sudo apt update -y && sudo apt install -y clang
onCreateCommand.4-create-startup-script: echo '#!/bin/bash\nsurreal start --username root --password root --bind 0.0.0.0:8000 --log debug file:///workspaces/xBIM/debug/db/database.db &' > /usr/local/bin/start-surrealdb && chmod +x /usr/local/bin/start-surrealdb
onCreateCommand.5-create-stop-script:
echo '#!/bin/bash
PID=$(pgrep -f "surreal start")
if [ -z "$PID" ]; then
  echo "SurrealDB is not running"
  exit 0
fi
echo "Stopping SurrealDB (PID: $PID)..."
kill $PID
sleep 2
if ps -p $PID > /dev/null; then
  echo "SurrealDB did not terminate gracefully, forcing..."
  kill -9 $PID
fi
echo "SurrealDB stopped successfully"' > /usr/local/bin/stop-surrealdb && chmod +x /usr/local/bin/stop-surrealdb
